Display_Message_For_Improper_Redirection: Improper Redirection Url in Patterns file,please update

Display_Message_For_Improper_Eng_Redirec: Improper en_US Redirection Url in Patterns file,please update
Display_Message_For_AlternateParam_Match: Base Url uses alternate locale identifier
Display_Message_For_FallBack_Match_BaseU: Base locale Url in resource file
Display_Message_For_Random_Match_BaseUrl: Base Url uses different locale identifier than expected
Display_Message_For_AlternateParam_Match: Redirected Url uses alternate locale identifier
Display_Message_For_Random_Match_Redirec: Redirection Url uses different locale identifier than expected
Display_Message_For_Readme_Body1: 1. Configure the result cells of UrlvsLocaleReport Sheet using color codes of corresponding exception type mentioned in Configurations Sheet.
Display_Message_For_Readme_Body2: 2. Configure the Validation of Base and Redirection Urls by putting Yes/No in Configurations Sheet under Validations To Be Performed.
Display_Message_For_Readme_Body3: 3. Configure the Loc Modification Start & End Date to fetch urls' within the specified period.
Display_Message_For_Readme_Body4: 4. After applying the Configurations, upload the xlsx file in uvscan.corp.adobe.com specifying the same path, and run uvscan once for All Locales.
Display_Message_For_Readme_Body5: 1. Check the Passed/PWE(PassedWithException)/Failed Status of all urls in UrlvsLocaleReport Sheet.
Display_Message_For_Readme_Body6: 2. Check the Base and Redirection Urls of each locale in DetailedReport Sheet.
Display_Message_For_Readme_Body7: 3. Check the Passed/PWE/Failed count status in LocalevsStatusReport.
Display_Message_For_Readme_Body8: 4. Check the latest status of all records(including historical records), from MasterReport.xlsx under Results.
Display_Message_For_Readme_Body9: 1. To add helpx urls', add the String ids as <helpResources(id)> in Column A, Japanese helpx urls in Column B, and English help urls in Column D.
Display_Message_For_Readme_Body10: 2. After adding helpx urls', upload the xlsx file on uvscan.corp.adobe.com and run on ja_JP locale first. After the first run on helpx urls' on ja_JP , the String ids automatically get changed from <helpResources(id)> to English Base Url.
